info.game_comments: Battle of the Decades: The 2000s game 4.

jeopardy_round: THE LONG & THE SHORT OF IT

(1, 1).clue: This word for "small" often describes certain hours of the morning

(2, 1).clue: Here's the official portrait of the christening of this little fella

(3, 1).clue: This saint's written output was more than 8 million words, & he died around age 50

(5, 2).clue: Many of the state government offices in this capital are housed in the Harry S Truman state office building

(3, 5).clue: This German, the "philosopher of pessimism", had such a gloomy outlook that even his own mother disliked him

(4, 5).clue: In her first Top 40 hit, she asked, "Why'd you have to go and make things so complicated?"

(1, 1).clue: The most common isotope of this element is called protium because its nucleus is only one proton
